attributes.action: Give Nigel Farage a knighthood for returning our independence and sovereignty.
attributes.background: Give the great man farage a well deserved knighthood for fighting to free us from shackles of EU and for returning our independence.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
